title: Password Reset Procedure
text: To reset your password: 1) Go to login page, 2) Click 'Forgot Password', 3) Enter your email, 4) Check email for reset link, 5) Follow instructions in email.

title: VPN Connection Setup
text: To connect to VPN: 1) Download VPN client, 2) Install and open application, 3) Enter server details provided by IT, 4) Enter your credentials, 5) Click connect.

title: Email Configuration Guide
text: To configure email: 1) Open email client, 2) Add new account, 3) Enter email and password, 4) Configure server settings (IMAP/SMTP), 5) Test connection.
